```go
go run initState.go -srcpath=/home/gavin/project01/Kmeans/blk_read -outFile=/home/gavin/project01/Kmeans/blk_read/initState
```

```shell
该程序用于获取所有节点记录开始之前的已经存在的blk文件块。

输入为目录：
目录下文件为提取log日志获得的包含读写的数据流.

gavin@gavin:~/project01/Kmeans/blk_read$ tree ./
./
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave1.log.0.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave1.log.1.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave1.log.2.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave2.log.0.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave2.log.1.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave2.log.2.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave3.log.0.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave3.log.1.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave3.log.2.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave4.log.0.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave4.log.1.json
├── hadoop-root-datanode-slave4.log.2.json
└── initState初始状态.txt
输出为：
目标文件路径
```

> ```
> eg:    hadoop-root-datanode-slave1.log.0.json
> ```
